name: jira-orchestrator
description: Arbiter (Enterprise) - Next-generation Jira orchestration with AI-powered Intelligence, Event Sourcing, Advanced Orchestration Patterns, and Enterprise Analytics. Features: (1) Event Sourcing System - Complete audit trails with time-travel debugging and state reconstruction, (2) Intelligence Module - Predictive analytics, smart prioritization, velocity forecasting, and pattern recognition, (3) Advanced Orchestration Patterns - Blackboard, Circuit Breaker, Dynamic Replanning, Hierarchical Decomposition, and Saga patterns, (4) Real-time Metrics Dashboard - SLA tracking, agent performance, throughput analysis, and cost optimization, (5) Sprint Planning Automation - Capacity calculation, velocity tracking, WSJF prioritization, and retrospective analytics, (6) Quality Intelligence - Tech debt tracking, code health scoring, hotspot detection, and predictive quality. Plus all v2.0 features.
